cause.description:
We help the sick children and teenagers of america by donating to local hospitals, and volunteering whenever possible. YOU could change their lives forever.
1. Everyone deserves an equal chance at living life to their fullest
2. No child or teen should have to go through what it takes to battle a major illness
cause.mission: help children and teens who are battling serious illnesses
cause.name: the Sick Children and Teenagers of America
